name: Cinemabase.GitHub.io
body: ### Welcome to CinemaBase. ``` Android mobile application which allows you to browse ratings and descriptions of current top rated movies or search through movie database to find ratings and description of favorite movie titles. Find out what friends are saying about currently rated movies, and give your own thoughts about movies you have watched. ``` ### Authors and Contributors Daniel Hernandez (@dehernandez7791), and Victor Romero (@romero4742), Computer Science students Cal Polytechnic Pomona. ### Support or Contact Having trouble with app? Contact cinemabase.help@gmail.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
